REC_EMPTY_MSG_010: ̄It seems the Monster Farm is full. Please release a monster to make room.
INN_MSG_030:
́Very well.
If you get tired, come see me again!
NPC_CRYSTAL_000:
́I am an Incarnus that collects various things
and studies them to find irregularities. 
ā
ITEM_MSG_010:
́You aren't from around here, so I bet
you have many rare curiosities.
ā
This is an Item Shop.
How can I help you?
MINE_SAIDAN_010:
Offer the 3 Incarnii souls up at
the altar?Ă
PARC_NPC_TICO_REC:
̄A member of the hard working Pipit tribe, that
makes incredible weapons. It's not a chicken...
INN_MSG_010:
́Wow, Humans are a rare sight around here.
I see Tiko has brought you.
ā
This is the Incarnus Village. It's been several
hundred years since we were last visited by humans.
ā
When outsiders visit, I must accomodate them.
You look tired. Want to rest a bit?Ă
INN_MSG_020:
́When outsiders visit, I must accomodate them.
You look tired. Want to rest a bit?Ă
INN_MSG_020_CLEAR:
́When outsiders visit, I must accomodate them.
You look tired. Want to rest a bit?Ĉ
INN_MSG_050:
́I understand now. You should check the altar in
the center of town. First, would you like to rest?Ă
INN_MSG_060_CLEAR:
́Looking over you, I realize you must be what
they call a Monster Master. Yeah, that's the term Wildcard used..
ā
Well, I guess it's been hundreds of years since then.
But no use reminiscing about that right now.
ā
When we have outsiders arrive, they are treated as
our guests. Would you like to rest for a bit?Ĉ
NPC_CRYSTAL_020:
́I could really use the help of a
Monster Master like you with something.
ā
However, as you know we have a problem on our
hands. Once peace returns, we'll work it out.
TICO_SUMMON_043:
̂As you know, Wildcard comes from a line of Incarnii.
Within those Incarnii, is there one you wish to summon?Ġ
INN_MSG_040:
́Hope you got some good rest.
Be sure to take care out there!
NPC_CRYSTAL_010:
́You are a Monster Master, right? Interesting!
I'd love to see what you can do.
ā
However, as you know we have a problem on our
hands. Once peace returns, we'll work it out.
TICO_SUMMON_033:
̂Would you like to offer Incarnii Stones in exchange for summoning an Incarnus?
...Is what I would like to ask, but you don't have enough.
ā
Jester and Wildcard each require 10 stones.
Royal Flush requires 20 stones.
ā
Kings of each suit require 5 stones as well.
All others cost 1　Incarnii Stone to summon.
ā
「 Incarnii Stones are hard to come by, I know, but
if you want the Incarnii to join you, you'll have to find them!
PARC_NPC_B_REC:
̄One day I hope to be able to evolve into a
high tier powerful Incarnus. However, I am not ready, yet.
INN_MSG_060:
́Looking over you, I realize you must be what
they call a Monster Master. Yeah, that's the term Wildcard used..
ā
Well, I guess it's been hundreds of years since then.

ā
When we have outsiders arrive, they are treated as
our guests. Would you like to rest for a bit?Ă
NO_PRAY_PILLAR_LUTRA:
́Presently, our treasure the Mirror of Ra has
completely lost its ability to reveal the true nature of reality.
ā
However, if you pray to the Incarnii monuments located
around the Incarnus Realm, the power might return.
ā
If you pray at all 15 in total, you should be able to
restore enough power to make use of it!
ONE_PRAY_PILLAR_LUTRA:
́Amazing, ȁ! It's a miracle!
A fraction of power has returned to the Mirror of Ra!
ā
At this rate, you'll pray at all 15 shrines in no time,
and will be able to use it!
NPC_CRYSTAL_071:
́East of here, there is a giant tornado near
one of the caves. Try heading there sometime!
ā
If you use the tornado, you can reach the floating islands
above, where they say a pillar called a conduit awaits.
ā
If you decide to go, take me with you too!
Hehehe, i'd love to see how your race goes.
DEMO_903_AFT_LUTRA:
́If what Tiko says is true, the demons will 
resume their invasion on our world before long.
ā
We can't let one more day pass without investigating
the clues left by the Incarnus Artifact you have.
ā
I'm afraid I can't be of much help to you, I have
no power to lend you as a lowly apprentice Incarnus.
ā
You must find the others as soon as possible! They
will lend you the power you need to stop the demons!
DEMO_906_AFT_LUTRA:
́Well i'll be! You say you've located the
other Incarnii using the Mirror of Ra!?
ā
..I see, so their form was changed, along with the
form of the Djinn,whom leads the demons...
ā
But if the Djinn is back too, then that means
the Demon Realm will invade again.
ā
ȁ, you must hurry up and revive
our King at once!
MINE_SAIDAN_020: There is an altar overflowing with holy power here.
DEMO_918_AFT_LUTRA:
́I heard you were able to revive Jester
with the help of that mirror!
ā
I'm sorry I wasn't of more help with my
utter lack of power...
ā
If there are still any Incarnii you can't find,
ask Tiko and he might be able to help.
ā
ȁ, I am grateful for what you've done
so far. Please help us out until the end!
NPC_CRYSTAL_063:
́The Conduit of Despair is located somewhere
near the entrance to the Demon Realm.
ā
Find the Pure Darkonium deposit, then look for a giant
rock. On the other side of the rock is a stone pillar.
ā
This one activates the final Speed Road, so be
prepared to reach maximum velocity!
ā
If you are determined enough to challenge it,
i'll be cheering you on from the sidelines!
LUTRA_HEART_AFT_MSG:
́I heard you were able to revive
Jester with the help of that Mirror!
ā
I'm sorry I wasn't of more help with my
utter lack of power...
ā
If there are still any Incarnii you can't find,
ask Tiko and he might be able to help.
ā
We are so close to reviving Wildcard so
keep lending us your help until the end!
DEMO_921_AFT_LUTRA:
́You were able to revive not only
Jester but Wildcard as well!
ā
Thanks so much for your help, ȁ! We
are ever so grateful that you ended up here!
ā
With your continued help, i'm sure we will
even be able to defeat the Djinn himself!
NPC_B_DEMO_921_AFT_MSG:
́Wildcard has been revived! I saw
it with my own eyes!
ā
When you think about it, the number of hardships
Wildcard has endured is staggering.
ā
I believe in him to close the Phantom Gate and
put an end to the Djinn's attacks once and for all!
SPEED_CLEAR_AFT_LUTRA_040:
́A world where the Incarnii and the
Djinn will coexist together in harmony. Amazing!
ā
In addition to that, now the Incarnus Realm is
seeing visits by people from other worlds, too.
ā
For instance, there are reports of a strange man
appearing near the springs to the south.
ā
I am a bit concerned actually, so i've marked it on
your map. Could you please investigate for me?
SPEED_CLEAR_AFT_LUTRA_050:
́「ȁ, I see you've got to check on
the strange man that appeared to the south.
(event_01}
He appears to be something called a "pirate". Ever since
the end of the war, all kinds of people are showing up.
ā
However, based on your reports it doesn't seem like
this one means for any harm to come to our realm.
ā
Thanks very much, you've put me at ease. Please
take this as a token of my gratitude.
SPEED_CLEAR_AFT_LUTRA_060:
́If you didn't know, Incarnii Stones
 can be used to summon Incarnii from another dimension.
ā
Go see Tiko to learn more about that. I'm sure
it will be of some help to you, ȁ!
NPC_A:
́Wow, Humans are a rare sight around here.
I see Tiko has brought you.
ā
This is the Incarnus Village. It's been several
hundred years since we were last visited by humans.
NPC_A_HEART_AFT_MSG:
́I've been informed by the others.
There is an alter at the center of town.
ā
Please proceed there immediately!
NPC_A_DEMO_921_AFT_MSG:
́I can see that you are a 
Monster Master. 
ā
Wildcard once brought a Monster Master
here several hundred years ago.
ā
That Monster Master visited for a while, but
ultimately returned to the Human Realms.
NPC_A_SPEED_CLEAR_AFT_MSG:
́This is the Incarnus Village. You are welcome
to stay here for as long as you'd like to!
NPC_B:
́Even us Incarnii are not born as strong
beings. The king was no different.
ā
Only through great effort, exceeding ones limits, and
transitioning through 4 forms did he get where he is now.
NPC_B_HEART_AFT_MSG:
́Jester will be revived when all 4 forms
are collected and assembled safely.
ā
All that remains next is Wildcard. Offer the Heart
Fragments to the altar, when you can!
NPC_B_SPEED_CLEAR_AFT_MSG:
́It seems that the Incarnii who returned here after
peace was restored are going on a jouney once again.
ā
They will continue to offer their powers to fight
wherever evil rears its ugly face.
NPC_C_MSG_010:
́Noble ȁ. Jester sends
his regards.
ā
He would like for you to raise this
Windeo to foster its growth.
ā
How about it,
will you take him with you?Ă
REC_GATE_011:
̄A Wormhole created by Wildcard. The
Demon Realm awaits on the other side.
NPC_C_MSG_020:
́I see. Well, if you change your
mind, come talk to me again.
NPC_C_MSG_030:
́I thought that's what you would say.
Well then, please look after Windeo.
NPC_C_WINDEO_GET_AFT_MSG:
́Now that you mention it, our King assumed the
form of Royal Flush when he battled the Djinn.
ā
It takes unheard of force of will to remain in that
form for even just a minute. However,
ā
The child Incarnus that you raise can grow to
unlimited potential if given the right treatment.
NPC_CRYSTAL_050:
́You fought the Djinn, didn't you? I need your
help with something. Listen closely!
ā
It's come to my attention that there is a strange
path called Speed Road here in the Incarnus Realm.
ā
To arrive there, you'll need to ride upon monsters,
so this is right up your alley.
ā
If you use this artifact at a conduit, Speed Road 
will appear. Take it and try it out!
NPC_CRYSTAL_060:
́Take that, and use the Tornado near the springs
near the southern edge of this Realm.
ā
On the floating islands above there, find the pillar to
initiate Masters Road.
ā
If you are riding a small monster, you can use
this stone pillar to activate Speed Road.
ā
Go there first, and i'll follow. 
Help me figure out what kind of place it is!
NPC_CRYSTAL_070:
́I'm interested in seeing just how fast Speed Road
can push you! You've got me wanting even more speed. 
ā
Find the other Speed Roads and activate
them at their conduits!
NPC_CRYSTAL_080:
́If you want to push yourself to even faster
speeds, search for the other Speed Roads.
ā
Find their conduits, and challenge them to push yourself
to new speeds to overcome their thrilling difficulty levels!
NPC_CRYSTAL_081:
́It's great that we are coexisting with the Demons
isn't it? Especially since this Speed Road is in the Demon Realm!
ā
Do you remember seeing a Pure Darkonium deposit
somewhere near the entrance to the Demon Realm?
ā
The conduit to activate the Speed Road there is
located behind a nearby boulder. 
ā
This will be the final Speed Road!
I can't wait to see you cross the finish line!
NPC_CRYSTAL_061:
́The conduit of hope is on a floating island near
the southern tip of the Incarnus Realm high in the skies.
ā
Head east on the central road, then south through the
ravine until you arrivate the springs.
ā
From there, you can ride a small monster and use the
tornado to propel you to the floating islands.
ā
Activate the conduit, and Speed Road will appear!
I can't wait to see you cross the finish line!
NPC_CRYSTAL_062:
́The conduit of aspirations is located on a
floating island in the east area of the Incarnus Realm.
ā
First, travel down the eastern road towards the giant tornado.
Find the nearby cave and proceed into it.
ā
Somewhere in that cave is a tornado that will propel you
upwards to where the conduit it.
ā
Fun for you and fun for me!
I can't wait to see you cross the finish line!
NPC_CRYSTAL_100:
́Ah, I see you've been gathering Space Time Crystals!
ā
Let's trade!
PARC_NPC_WINDEO_REC:
̄King Windeo's junior. It has an innocent
looking face that you wish you could punch.
NPC_CRYSTAL_200:
́Talk to me if you'd like to trade!
ā
I have some interesting news for you!
ā
It seems that there is a total of
3 different Speed Roads to find.
ā
They are named, "Hope", "Aspirations",
and finally, "Despair".
ā
At least that's how the rumors go.
ā
You can assume various titles by completing them
while collecting a number of crystals.
ā
For hope, the goal is 1000. For Aspirations, 5000.
Finally, for Despair you'll need to collect 10000.
ā
I'm looking forward to trading for
the crystals you collect!
